author: Kelsie Gibson
title: Barry Jenkins Speech at the 2017 Oscars | POPSUGAR Entertainment
text:
Barry Jenkins Speech at the 2017 Oscars Barry Jenkins's Poignant Oscars Speech Is Exactly What You Need to Hear Right Now February 26, 2017 by Kelsie Gibson 0 Shares 
Barry Jenkins gave a truly moving speech when he accepted best adapted screenplay alongside Tarell Alvin McCraney at the Oscars. Aside from thanking his friends, family, and crew, the Moonlight director and writer took a moment to talk about the importance of inclusivity. "All you people out there who feel like there is no mirror for you . . . we will not forget you," he told the camera.
